original_text: The pride of thine heart hath deceived thee, thou that dwellest in the clefts of the rock, whose habitation is high; that saith in his heart, Who shall bring me down to the ground?
korean_text: 너의 마음의 교만이 너를 속였도다 바위 틈에 거주하며 높은 곳에 사는 자여 네가 마음에 이르기를 누가 능히 나를 땅에 끌어내리겠느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: The pride of thine heart hath deceived thee
thou that dwellest in the clefts of the rock
Who shall bring me down to the ground?
